intro: On the 3rd day of the same month, we commemorate the Holy Prophet Zephaniah.

who: Holy Hieromartyr Theodore, Archbishop of Alexandria
intro: On the same day we commemorate the Holy Hieromartyr Theodore, Archbishop of Alexandria.

who: Holy Father Theodoulos the former Eparch
intro: On the same day we commemorate our holy father Theodoulos, the former Eparch.

who: Holy Father John, Bishop of Coloneia, the Hesychast
intro: On the same day we commemorate our holy father John, Bishop of Coloneia, the Hesychast.
On the same day Saints Agapius, Seleucus, and Mamas are perfected by the sword.
On the same day we commemorate our holy father Theodoulos of Cyprus.
On the same day we commemorate the Holy Hieromartyr Gabriel of Ganos, formerly Bishop of Constantinople, who later suffered martyrdom in Prusa in the year 1659.

who: Holy New Martyr Angelēs of Chios
intro: On the same day the Holy New Martyr Angelēs, who contested on Chios in the year 1813, is perfected by the sword.
